import { ChevronsRight, Download, Eye, Palette, Server } from "lucide-react"; import ashish_cv from "../../Assets/resume/ashish_resume.pdf"; const handleDownload = () => { const link = document.createElement("a"); link.href = ashish_cv; link.download = "Ashish_Frontend_CV.pdf"; document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); }; const Resume = () => (
My Professional Background

Resume

Explore my professional experience and skills directly in your browser, or download a PDF copy for easy access anytime.

View Online
); export default Resume;
